name: Down to Earth (Erikelelf)
description:
Oh no! Martians have attacked your spaceship on your trip back to Earth! Use your control over your ship's gravity field to stomp on the martians and survive as long as possible.  Made over 3 days as part of the Scorespace Game Jam! The theme was "Gravity".
